/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from the middle of the street, looking towards the horizon. The street is flanked by lush green trees on both sides, creating a natural canopy overhead. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with wispy white clouds. A few cars can be seen in the distance, driving along the road. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
